import{createStore,compose,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./combineReducers";// compose are enhancers used for composing middlewares for redux
var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var configureStore=function configureStore(){return createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));};var store=configureStore();export default store;
